Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $120. I understand its worth to you might be around $80, but I hope this offer will be appealing. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
